text: Rolf Heinzmann is a Swiss para-alpine skier. He represented Switzerland at the Winter Paralympics in 1980, 1984, 1994, 1998 and 2002. == Career == Heinzmann represented Switzerland in five editions of the Winter Paralympics and in total he won twelve gold medals and two silver medals.
